story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1101_0100_20: Finally, the day of the battle arrived!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_0200_10: I hereby announce the start of a new Arceus Cup!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_0300_10:
The challenger this time is Leon, Champion of the
Galar region!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_0400_10:
And the opponent he’s chosen is Kanto’s living
legend: Red!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I’m sure everyone still remembers the last battle
between these two!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_0700_10: Today’s battle won’t end the same as last time.
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_1000_10: (I still haven’t been able to awaken my arc suit.)
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_1100_10:
(But I don’t think all that training Charizard and I
did will go to waste!)
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_1200_10:
(Even if we don’t have an arc suit, we’ll still beat
Red!)
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_1300_10: And now, let the battle begin!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_1400_10: Just what I thought you’d do! Just like Blue said!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I told you, didn’t I? Today’s not gonna end like
last time!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_1900_10: But I see you’re not the same either!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_2100_10: (Whoa! Trying to end this, is he?)
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_2200_10: (Then I’ll just have to do the same!)
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1101_2500_20: Which pair will come out on top?!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1101_2600_20: Leon’s Gigantamax Charizard’s returned to normal!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_3100_10:
(They’re also the cheers of a cruel audience who
wants nothing more than to see one of us lose.)
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_3200_10:
(They’re hoping Red will win again...and that
I’ll lose...)
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_3300_10:
(I was so close to pushing past my fear—
to seizing another victory.)
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_3600_10: (I can’t see a path to victory.)
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_3900_10: Don’t give up, Lee! You too, Charizard!!!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_4100_10: You can do it, Lee!!! You can still turn it around!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_4200_10:
C’mon! You’re not just gonna stand there and
take it, are you?
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_4300_10:
Pull it together, Mr. Unbeatable Champion!
You can’t lose this!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_4500_10: You can still win this! Don’t give up!!!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_4900_10:
We’re carrying the hopes and dreams of all the
Trainers out there from Galar!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_5100_10:
As the strongest sync pair from Galar, we can’t
lose again!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1101_5200_20: Look at it! And that shine!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_5500_10: I didn’t get lost, thanks to you!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_5600_10:
We’re going to have a real champion time!
Let’s have the greatest time in the greatest match!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1101_5800_20: Red’s Charizard doesn’t have much stamina left!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_5900_10:
We’ve nearly reached our limit, too...
We’ve reached the pinnacle of battle!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_6100_10:
Right, then! Laugh or cry all you want, but this
is it! This is the end!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_6600_10: (Charizard and I truly felt your cheers!)
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_6900_10: Thanks, Red! It was a great match!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_7000_10:
I may have won this one...but who knows what’ll
happen next time!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_7500_10:
Red and I and both our Charizard will continue
being the greatest you’ve ever seen!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_7600_10:
And we’ll have the greatest battles for the whole
world to enjoy!
story_arceus_02_07000/2401_1001_7800_10: We’ll fire up the whole arena over and over!
